column1: Goal: Turn the door handle down and back up
*.Goal: Reach out to the door handle
*...Flexion making its hook parallel to the table
*...Also Verify the mode and hook direction are good
..Verify if the hook is fully opened
..Also Verify if the hook is fully closed
..Flexion to rotate the door handle down
..Also Verify if the hook is fully turned
.Goal: Turn the door handle back up
..Extension to rotate to door handle back up
..Look if the hook is fully rotated
..Also Verify if the hook is fully opened
